about_the_game:
Fat Cat wants his rent and the only way to get it is deep in the mines. In this 2D sidescrolling strategy/resource management game, excavate and traverse your underground mine shafts to retrieve gold! Go into the mines and extract as much gold as you can. Setup your operation and reinvest your earnings into better gear and equipment to mine more gold and win the game! This line of work not only separates the gold from the dirt, but the pups from the dogs. With danger lurking in these ancient grounds, hungry Dinos awaken, searching for prey and loot. The wise miner doesn’t fear the Dino but sees it’s flesh and bones as a potential fuel source for their operations. Gold mining is a treasure hunt, so open your miner’s map, test some dirt, and find that stash of gold!

YOUR TASK

  • Pan Dirt
  • Mine Gold
  • Smelt Coins
  • Make Rent



Dogs like to move it. You name it they'll carry it for you.
  • Ore
  • Gold Rich Dirt
  • Coins
  • Puppies
  • Flamables
  • Dino Prisoners



  • Family
  • Resources
  • House
  • Mine Shaft

Beware of Dinos




  • Routes
  • Family Business
  • Finances
  • Time
  • Resources

  • Rent is due at the end of every month

Bring dirt with gold in it to the surface. Wash away the dirt, then forge the remaining gold nuggets into coins to pay for your rent.

name: Golden Retriever

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 7th Gen or Equivalent
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 940MX or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: In this 2D sidescrolling strategy/resource management game, dig down into the gold rich dirt. Prospect, mine, and maintain, all while keeping Dinos at bay. Be sure to pay your landlord freshly smelted gold coins every month or get evicted...
